Hi All,

I'm reading multiple rows from excel sheet and compare it with DB.For comparison two resuts i'm using junit. It will iterate through a for loop and in for loop i've assert method.But It takes all the assert methods as a single test.I know it is recommended to use one test method for testing one case. But i want a report to be displyed saying which comparison method is failed .How many comparisions are done ? can anybody please help me regarding this?Thanks in advance

Regards

mrp
